name: Transcribe Zoom recordings with OpenAI's Whisper, summarize, create audio files with ElevenLabs and send via Slack
description: Leverage OpenAI's Whisper to transcribe Zoom calls, generate concise summaries, craft audio files using ElevenLabs, and effortlessly share them through Slack communications. Please note that the Whisper API file limit is 25mb, we have used CloudConvert to convert these files to smaller mp3 files for Whisper to transcribe.
